original_text: And they were all filled with the Holy Ghost, and began to speak with other tongues, as the Spirit gave them utterance.
korean_text: 그들이 다 성령의 충만함을 받고 성령이 말하게 하심을 따라 다른 언어들로 말하기를 시작하니라

sentences.original_text: And they were all filled with Holy Ghost
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들 모두가 성령으로 가득 채워졌고

sentences.original_text: and began to speak with other tongues
